attributes.action: Offer substantial financial help to all employees in the UK Aviation industry.
attributes.additional_details: Only you the government can release the funds to bridge this momentous period in our history. This is not a free market environment to be left to play itself out. This is our access to the global infrastructure under threat. Our future regeneration and wealth relies on us.
attributes.background: Thousands of aircrew, cleaners, caterers, engineers, ground staff, baggage handlers and more, are being left without money to pay their bills. Whilst the world fights COVID-19, we need to be here when you need us again. Help us now, so that we can be here.
